::: {.hidden}
<!-- Greek letters -->
\newcommand{\al}{\alpha}
\newcommand{\Al}{\Alpha}
\newcommand{\be}{\beta}
\newcommand{\Be}{\Beta}
\newcommand{\ga}{\gamma}
\newcommand{\Ga}{\Gamma}
\newcommand{\de}{\delta}
\newcommand{\De}{\Delta}
\newcommand{\eps}{\varepsilon}
\newcommand{\ph}{\varphi}
\newcommand{\Ph}{\Phi}
\newcommand{\ps}{\psi}
\newcommand{\Ps}{\Psi}
\newcommand{\si}{\sigma}
\newcommand{\Si}{\Sigma}
\newcommand{\w}{\omega}
\newcommand{\W}{\Omega}

<!-- set operations -->
\newcommand{\union}{\cup}
\newcommand{\Union}{\bigcup}
\newcommand{\inter}{\cap}
\newcommand{\Inter}{\bigcap}

<!-- script letters -->
\newcommand{\sS}{\mathscr{S}}
\newcommand{\sL}{\mathscr{L}}
\newcommand{\sB}{\mathscr{B}}
\newcommand{\sF}{\mathscr{F}}
\newcommand{\sT}{\mathscr{T}}
\newcommand{\sP}{\mathscr{P}}
\newcommand{\sX}{\mathscr{X}}
\newcommand{\sY}{\mathscr{Y}}
\newcommand{\sZ}{\mathscr{Z}}

<!-- bold letters -->
\newcommand{\vx}{\vec{x}}
\newcommand{\vy}{\vec{y}}
\newcommand{\vz}{\vec{z}}
\newcommand{\vu}{\vec{u}}
\newcommand{\vw}{\vec{w}}
\newcommand{\p}{\mathbf{P}}
\newcommand{\q}{\mathbf{Q}}
\renewcommand{\v}{\mathbf{v}}
\newcommand{\f}{\mathbf{f}}
\newcommand{\g}{\mathbf{g}}
\newcommand{\h}{\mathbf{h}}
\renewcommand{\r}{\mathbf{R}}
\newcommand{\s}{\mathbf{S}}
\newcommand{\ss}{\mathbf{S}^*}
\newcommand{\provess}{\proves_{\s}}
\newcommand{\rprovess}{\rproves_{\ss}}
\newcommand{\provesp}{\proves_{\p}}
\newcommand{\proveshp}{\proves_{\Hp}}
\renewcommand{\t}{\mathbf{T}}
\newcommand{\provest}{\proves_{\t}}
\newcommand{\rprovest}{\leftrightarrow_{\t}}
\renewcommand{\c}{\mathbf{c}}

<!-- logic -->
\newcommand{\m}{\models}
\newcommand{\proves}{\vdash}
\newcommand{\rproves}{\Vdash}
\newcommand{\peq}{\dashv \vdash}
\newcommand{\nec}{\Box}
\newcommand{\pos}{\Diamond}
\newcommand{\true}{\mathbf{T}}
\newcommand{\false}{\mathbf{F}}
\newcommand{\ind}{\Perp}

<!-- propositional logic -->
\newcommand{\P}{\mathbf{P}}
\newcommand{\Lp}{L_{\p}}
\newcommand{\Hp}{\mathbf{HP}}
\renewcommand{\iff}{\leftrightarrow}
\newcommand{\into}{\rightarrow}
\newcommand{\conj}{\wedge}
\newcommand{\Conj}{\bigwedge}
\newcommand{\disj}{\vee}
\newcommand{\Disj}{\bigvee}
\newcommand{\cond}{\rightarrow}
\newcommand{\imp}{\rightarrow}
\newcommand{\M}{\mathcal{M}}

<!-- syllogistic logic -->
\newcommand{\con}[1]{\sim\!#1}
\newcommand{\S}{\mathbf{S}}
\newcommand{\Ts}{T_{\s}}
\newcommand{\Ls}{L_{\s}}
\newcommand{\acop}{\textbf{a}}
\newcommand{\ecop}{\textbf{e}}
\newcommand{\icop}{\textbf{i}}
\newcommand{\ocop}{\textbf{o}}
\newcommand{\cop}[2]{#1\!\ast\!#2}
\newcommand{\all}[2]{#1\textrm{\acop}#2}
\newcommand{\no}[2]{#1\textrm{\ecop}#2}
\newcommand{\some}[2]{#1\textrm{\icop}#2}
\newcommand{\somenot}[2]{#1\textrm{\ocop}#2}

<!-- miscellaneous -->
\newcommand{\smallblank}{\,\underline{\hspace{0.5cm}}\,}
\newcommand{\largeblank}{\,\underline{\hspace{1cm}}\,}
:::
